```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

data <- readRDS("../data/raw_data/u05450_processed_data.rds")
```

model 1

```{r}
u05450_mod_z_1 <- lm(z(depression) ~ z(satisficing) + z(maximizing_strategy) + z(maximizing_goal) + 
     z(Age) + Gender + z(neuroticism) + z(extraversion) + z(self_rumination), 
   data = data) 

export_ols(
  u05450_mod_z_1, 
  key_effects = c("z(satisficing)", "z(maximizing_strategy)", "z(maximizing_goal)")
)

```

```{r}
u05450_mod_z_2 <- lm(z(happiness) ~ z(satisficing) + z(maximizing_strategy) + z(maximizing_goal) +
```
